title: One Piece
quotes: I'm gonna be the Pirate King!
When the world shoves you around, you just gotta stand up and shove back. It's not like somebody's gonna save you if you start babbling excuses.
Miracles only happen to those who never give up.
I don’t want to conquer anything. I just think the guy with the most freedom in this whole ocean… is the Pirate King!
If I can't even protect my captain's dream, then whatever ambition I have is nothing but talk!
It's not about possible or impossible. I'm doing it because I want to. I decided that I would become the Pirate King the day I decided to carry this hat!

I love heroes, but I don't want to be one. Do you even know what a hero is!? For example, you have some meat. Pirates will feast on the meat but the hero will distribute it among the people! I want to eat the meat!
I don't want to live a thousand years. If I just live through today, that'll be enough.
There comes a time when a man has to stand and fight. That time is when his friends' dreams are laughed at.
When do you think people die? When they are shot with a bullet? No! When they eat a soup made from a poisonous mushroom!? No! It's when... they are forgotten.
